line.comment: * Mayhem.Task.Support resets the script if needed.
* 5000 is mayhem 3 default rep amount below..
* Add-Ons 1.4: Aran repairs 4x better than standard carriers.
* set maintenance factor to 100 for all docked carrier ships.

* We peridocally check to ensure that any 'owned' dockable ships by this carrier are NOT members of any fleet, as they are by definition support ships and this role would be in conflict with the role of a fleet ship.
* Additionally, if the player manually re-homebases a ship to a carrier, there was nothing in the system that would periodically pick up on the

* fact that the carrier now has a new support ship, and so no support task would ever run for that ship and the ship would never undock or even be named appropriately. So now we assign the support task.
* write to logfile 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%s %s', [THIS], 'Testing owned ship-', $ship, null, null
* . If the ship is in any fleet remove it.
* . If Support task is not running - Start it.
* If this is an actual Carrier and not a TM or M2, we can gradually repair other ships in the fleet that are:
* 4. Not a Little ship (any ship too small to contain other ships)
* not sure squadron is the right thing here. need to find fleet members.

sval.val: Mayhem.Task.Support resets the script if needed.
5000 is mayhem 3 default rep amount below..
Add-Ons 1.4: Aran repairs 4x better than standard carriers.
set maintenance factor to 100 for all docked carrier ships.

We peridocally check to ensure that any 'owned' dockable ships by this carrier are NOT members of any fleet, as they are by definition support ships and this role would be in conflict with the role of a fleet ship.
Additionally, if the player manually re-homebases a ship to a carrier, there was nothing in the system that would periodically pick up on the

fact that the carrier now has a new support ship, and so no support task would ever run for that ship and the ship would never undock or even be named appropriately. So now we assign the support task.
write to logfile 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%s %s', [THIS], 'Testing owned ship-', $ship, null, null
. If the ship is in any fleet remove it.
. If Support task is not running - Start it.
If this is an actual Carrier and not a TM or M2, we can gradually repair other ships in the fleet that are:
4. Not a Little ship (any ship too small to contain other ships)
not sure squadron is the right thing here. need to find fleet members.
